name: 莫兰迪色系
description: Giorgio Morandi 画作的 muted color system，所有颜色都有灰色底色

typography.fonts: Georgia, Noto Serif SC (serif with artistic personality)

decorations.strong: No background, just color or italic

name: 克莱因蓝
description: International Klein Blue (IKB) by Yves Klein, 单色系设计，极简而强烈

designApproach: Monochrome design (only Klein Blue + black + white)
Use Klein Blue for all accents (H1, H2, strong, links)

decorations.h1: Klein Blue + 700 weight + letter-spacing 0.1em

name: 多巴胺配色
description: 高饱和度的糖果色系，充满活力和快乐

decorations.h1: 96D or higher weight

name: 蒂芙尼蓝
description: 优雅的蓝绿色系，经典而精致

designApproach: Use Tiffany Blue for H1, H2 borders, links

name: 牛油果绿
description: 温暖的有机绿色系，自然舒适

typography.fonts: Noto Serif SC, Georgia (serif) or rounded sans-serif

decorations.h1: color #5F8D78 + textAlign center

name: 威士忌琥珀色
description: 温暖的琥珀色和棕色系，如午后的咖啡馆

decorations.h1: color #3D405B + fontWeight bold + textAlign center

name: 黑金奢华
description: 经典的黑色与金色搭配，奢华而高贵

designApproach: Black background with gold accents OR Gold background with black text (inverted)

decorations.h1: gold color + serif font + letter-spacing 0.15em
decorations.h2: backgroundColor black + gold text (inverted luxury) OR borderBottom 2px solid gold

name: 深蓝青渐变

data.cssCode: .cyberpunk-text { color: #00f7ff; text-shadow: 2px 0 #ff00ff, -2px 0 #00ffff; }

name: Wong Kar-wai 王家卫风格
description: 王家卫电影的霓虹绿与红色调，香港夜色的暧昧与浪漫

data.cssCode: .wkw-text { color: #39FF14; text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(57, 255, 20, 0.5); }

name: Studio Ghibli 吉卜力风格
description: 吉卜力工作室动画的天空蓝、饱满绿与云朵白，自然治愈的色彩

data.cssCode: .ghibli-gradient { background: linear-gradient(180deg, #87CEEB 0%, #F5F5F5 100%); }

name: Blade Runner Noir 银翼杀手黑色
description: 银翼杀手雨夜的深蓝与橙色灯光，反乌托邦的黑色电影美学

data.cssCode: .bladerunner-rain { background: linear-gradient(180deg, #0A1628 0%, #2C3E50 100%); }

name: Monet Water Lilies 莫奈睡莲
description: 莫奈印象派睡莲的蓝紫绿色调，捕捉光与色彩的柔美

data.cssCode: .monet-blend { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #9DC3E6 0%, #B19CD9 50%, #77DD77 100%); }

name: Ukiyo-e 浮世绘
description: 日本浮世绘的普鲁士蓝与米色纸张，传统木版画的色彩美学

data.cssCode: .ukiyoe-outline { border: 3px solid #1A1A1A; }

name: 日本传统色 - 藍色
description: 日本传统色「藍色」，蓝草染制的深蓝

name: 中国传统色 - 水墨黑
description: 中国传统色「水墨黑」，水墨画的黑色

name: 宋代极简 - 汝窑天青
description: 宋代汝窑的天青色，极致素雅

name: Industry - Apple Tech Launch
description: Apple产品发布会的极简科技美学

name: Industry - Chanel Luxury
description: Chanel品牌的黑白奢华美学

name: Industry - Financial Times
description: 金融时报的专业财经配色

name: Industry - Eco Friendly
description: 环保品牌的自然绿色美学

name: Swiss Style / International Typographic Style
description: 瑞士国际主义设计风格，强调网格系统、无衬线字体和不对称布局，追求秩序与清晰

designApproach: Strong visual hierarchy through scale and weight

decorations.grid: Strict modular grid with visible guides (optional)
decorations.h1: Large scale (48-72pt), bold, left-aligned
decorations.images: Full-bleed or precisely aligned to grid
decorations.shapes: Geometric shapes (circles, squares) in primary red

data.cssCode: .swiss-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, 1fr); gap: 20px; } .swiss-headline { font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: -0.02em; }

name: Brutalism Design
description: 粗野主义设计风格，原始、大胆、未修饰的视觉语言，强调原始材料和强烈对比

decorations.borders: 3-5px solid black, visible on all elements
decorations.h1: uppercase, bold, black background with white text OR inverted
decorations.buttons: sharp corners, brutal hover effects (invert colors)

data.cssCode: .brutal-border { border: 4px solid #000; box-shadow: 5px 5px 0px #000; } .brutal-invert { background: #000; color: #fff; } .brutal-btn { border: 3px solid #000; background: #FFFF00; padding: 15px 30px; font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; }

name: Neo-Brutalism / Soft Brutalism
description: 新粗野主义，结合粗野主义的原始美学与波普艺术的色彩，更加活泼友好

designApproach: Bold, vibrant colors with black outlines

typography.fonts: Space Grotesk, Poppins, or bold sans-serif

decorations.h1: black background with bright text OR colored with black border
decorations.h2: colored background, black text, thick border
decorations.buttons: bold colors, black border, chunky shadow

data.cssCode: .neo-brutal { border: 3px solid #000; box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px #000; border-radius: 6px; } .neo-pattern { background-image: radial-gradient(#000 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 10px 10px; }

name: Vaporwave Aesthetic
description: 蒸汽波美学，80-90年代复古未来主义，霓虹粉与青色的 glitch 艺术

designApproach: Neon pink and cyan color scheme

typography.fonts: Courier New, monospace, or pixel fonts (retro computer)

decorations.h1: gradient text (pink to cyan), glitch animation
decorations.images: statues with neon filters, VHS effects

data.cssCode: .vaporwave-gradient { background: linear-gradient(90deg, #FF71CE, #01CDFE); -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; } .vaporwave-grid { background-image: linear-gradient(#B967FF 1px, transparent 1px), linear-gradient(90deg, #B967FF 1px, transparent 1px); background-size: 20px 20px; } .vaporwave-glow { text-shadow: 0 0 10px #FF71CE, 0 0 20px #01CDFE; }

name: Synthwave / Retrowave
description: 合成波/复古未来主义，80年代霓虹美学，落日、网格与未来城市的幻想

designApproach: Dark backgrounds with bright neon accents

decorations.h1: neon glow text-shadow, uppercase, wide letter-spacing
decorations.accents: geometric shapes (triangles, grids) in neon colors

data.cssCode: .synthwave-grid { background: linear-gradient(transparent 0%, #8338EC 100%), repeating-linear-gradient(0deg, transparent, transparent 1px, #FF006E 1px, #FF006E 2px); } .synthwave-glow { text-shadow: 0 0 5px #FF006E, 0 0 10px #8338EC, 0 0 20px #3A86FF; letter-spacing: 0.1em; }

name: Y2K Aesthetic
description: 千禧年美学，1999-2003年的乐观未来主义，闪光金属、泡泡糖粉与科技感

typography.fonts: Verdana, Comic Sans MS (period-appropriate), rounded sans-serif

decorations.h1: shiny gradient text, rounded borders

data.cssCode: .y2k-shiny { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #C0C0C0 0%, #FFFFFF 50%, #C0C0C0 100%); border-radius: 20px; } .y2k-bubble { background: radial-gradient(circle at 30% 30%, #FF69B4, #FF1493); border-radius: 50%; } .y2k-text { background: linear-gradient(to right, #00BFFF, #FF69B4); -webkit-background-clip: text; }

name: Minimalism Design
description: 极简主义设计，少即是多，强调留白、单色调和功能性

designApproach: Limited color palette (monochrome or 2-3 colors max)

typography.fonts: Inter, SF Pro, Helvetica Neue (clean sans-serif)

decorations.h1: black, bold, generous spacing, no decorations
decorations.buttons: minimal borders or no borders, subtle hover states

data.cssCode: .minimal-container { max-width: 65ch; margin: 0 auto; padding: 2rem; } .minimal-text { color: #1A1A1A; line-height: 1.7; font-weight: 400; } .minimal-border { border: 1px solid #E0E0E0; }

name: Victorian Era Design
description: 维多利亚时代设计风格，华丽装饰、繁复花纹与古典优雅

designApproach: Rich, deep colors (burgundy, forest green, navy)

typography.fonts: Didot, Bodoni, Garamond (elegant serif with high contrast)

decorations.borders: double borders, floral patterns, gold frames
decorations.h1: drop cap (3x size), burgundy or navy, ornamental flourishes
decorations.backgrounds: floral patterns, damask, vintage paper textures
decorations.ornaments: corner decorations, divider lines with flourishes

data.cssCode: .victorian-border { border: 3px double #D4AF37; padding: 20px; position: relative; } .victorian-border::before, .victorian-border::after { content: '❧'; position: absolute; color: #800020; font-size: 24px; } .victorian-dropcap { float: left; font-size: 3.5em; line-height: 0.8; padding-right: 8px; color: #800020; font-family: 'Didot', serif; }

name: 新中式风格 (New Chinese Style)
description: 现代新中式美学，融合传统中国色彩与极简设计理念，追求雅致与禅意

designApproach: Traditional Chinese colors with modern minimalism
Ink painting aesthetics (negative space, subtle gradients)
Rice paper textures and subtle patterns

typography.fonts: Noto Serif SC, Songti SC (宋体), serif

decorations.h1: ink black, centered, generous spacing, subtle vermillion accent
decorations.blockquote: porcelain blue background, ink gray text, elegant border
decorations.patterns: subtle cloud patterns (祥云), bamboo leaves, ink wash effects

data.cssCode: .new-chinese-ink { background: linear-gradient(to right, #1A1A1A, #3D3D3D); -webkit-background-clip: text; } .new-chinese-vermilion { color: #E64A19; border-left: 3px solid #E64A19; } .new-chinese-jade { background: #7D9D9C; color: #fff; padding: 8px 16px; }

name: 宋体美学 (Song Typography)
description: 宋体字的美学特征，源自宋代雕版印刷的优雅衬线字体风格

designApproach: Ink black text on rice paper white

typography.fonts: Songti SC, Noto Serif SC, STSong (宋体优先)
typography.characteristics: Horizontal strokes thin, vertical strokes thick (diamond-shaped terminals)

decorations.h1: Songti, ink black, centered, traditional vertical layout option
decorations.blockquote: indigo text, warm gray background, elegant left border
decorations.accents: seal red for important elements (buttons, links)

data.cssCode: .song-ink { color: #2C2C2C; font-family: 'Songti SC', 'Noto Serif SC', serif; } .song-seal { color: #C8102E; border-bottom: 2px solid #C8102E; } .song-indigo { color: #1E4D8C; background: #F0F4F8; padding: 12px 20px; }

name: 昭和时代美学 (Showa Era Aesthetic)
description: 日本昭和时代（1926-1989）的复古美学，融合大正浪漫与现代主义

designApproach: Mixture of Taisho Romanticism and modernism

typography.fonts: Noto Serif JP, Yu Mincho (明朝体), serif with Japanese aesthetic

decorations.h1: Showa red or navy, decorative borders, vintage poster style

data.cssCode: .showa-red { color: #DC143C; border: 3px solid #DC143C; padding: 10px 20px; } .showa-navy { background: #191970; color: #fff; } .showa-retro { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #FAF0E6, #FFB6C1); }

name: 枯山水禅意 (Karesansui Zen Garden)
description: 日本枯山水庭园美学，岩石与砂石表现的自然山水，禅宗极简主义

designApproach: Monochromatic with subtle moss green accents

decorations.h1: rock dark, centered, minimal, generous spacing
decorations.h2: subtle moss green accents, thin borders
decorations.elements: stone shapes, organic curves, minimal decoration

data.cssCode: .zen-sand { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #F8F8F8 0%, #D4D4D4 100%); } .zen-rock { color: #4A4A4A; font-weight: 300; letter-spacing: 0.15em; } .zen-moss { color: #6B8E23; border-left: 2px solid #6B8E23; }

name: 老上海风情 (Old Shanghai 1930s)
description: 1930年代上海的装饰艺术风格，东西方文化交融的黄金时代

typography.fonts: Noto Serif SC, elegant serif with Art Deco influence

decorations.h1: Art Deco gold, centered, decorative geometric patterns
decorations.h2: shanghai red or jade green, elegant borders
decorations.backgrounds: Art Deco geometric patterns, fan shapes

data.cssCode: .shanghai-gold { color: #D4AF37; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #D4AF37 0%, #FFF8DC 50%, #D4AF37 100%); } .shanghai-red { color: #B22222; border: 2px solid #B22222; } .shanghai-jade { background: #00A86B; color: #fff; } .shanghai-deco { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, #D4AF37 0px, #D4AF37 2px, transparent 2px, transparent 10px); }

name: Law Firm Professional (律师事务所专业)
description: 律师事务所专业设计系统，强调信任、权威与专业可靠性

designApproach: Clean layouts with generous white space

typography.fonts: Georgia, Times New Roman (classic serif for authority), Garamond

decorations.h1: navy blue or charcoal, serif, centered or left-aligned, no decoration
decorations.blockquote: cream background, charcoal text, left border

data.cssCode: .law-navy { color: #1E3A8A; } .law-burgundy { color: #7F1D1D; } .law-gold-border { border-bottom: 2px solid #D97706; } .law-cream-bg { background: #FFFBEB; border-left: 3px solid #1E3A8A; }

name: Mother & Baby Care (母婴呵护)
description: 母婴产品设计系统，柔和温暖的色彩传递关爱与呵护

decorations.h1: warm peach or soft pink, rounded, friendly
decorations.h2: baby blue or sage green, subtle underlines

data.cssCode: .baby-pink { background: #FFD1DC; color: #5D4037; border-radius: 16px; padding: 12px 24px; } .baby-blue { background: #B4D8E7; color: #fff; } .baby-soft-shadow { box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255, 203, 164, 0.3); border-radius: 20px; }

name: Eco-Friendly Sustainable (环保可持续)
description: 环保品牌设计系统，强调可持续性、自然与生态友好

decorations.h1: forest green, centered, nature-inspired

data.cssCode: .eco-forest { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2D5016 0%, #4A7C23 100%); color: #fff; } .eco-leaf { border-left: 4px solid #4A7C23; background: #E8F5E9; padding: 16px; } .eco-sun { color: #FFD700; } .eco-nature-bg { background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><circle cx="20" cy="80" r="5" fill="%234A7C23" opacity="0.1"/></svg>'); }

name: Cream Neutral (奶油中性色)
description: 经典的奶油色系，温暖优雅的米白色调，永恒而百搭

designApproach: Cream and ivory tones (not stark white)

decorations.h1: dark gray or charcoal, serif, elegant
decorations.h2: champagne or beige accents, subtle borders

data.cssCode: .cream-bg { background: #FFFDD0; } .cream-text { color: #4A4A4A; } .cream-champagne { background: #F7E7CE; color: #4A4A4A; padding: 12px 20px; } .cream-elegant { border: 1px solid #E8E8E8; }
